name: Drift Escape (Rewzu, Catoffee)
description:
Drift Escape is a game made for DNS - Summer 2022 Game Jam.

How to play:
  • Drift your way till the end of the track.
Default controls:
  • A/Left Arrow - Steer left
  • D/Right Arrow - Steer right
  • A + D/Left Arrow + Right Arrow - Brake
Have fun!
